commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Suppress error output when calling TM_QUERY
commits.body:
We have fallback values for when the tool fails so error output is to be expected.

This change was done in response to textmate/textmate@0bb275b4f09a1394b62feb175fc91bd776b27598

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Allow root-level scopes for scope names

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Use scope grammar for language grammars

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: To be expanded in the future to support scope selectors.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Do not require rubygems (not available via ruby 1.8 on Yosemite)
commits.body: I also removed the other unused (and commented) includes.
